intent_atoms.description: Parse and expose moof/mfhd sequence numbers in the media parsing pipeline, JSON export, and CLI formatting.
Fragment sequence numbers must exist and be monotonic across fragments.
Sequence numbers flow through parse pipeline, JSON export, and CLI formatting consistently.
Registered moof/mfhd handlers via ParsedBoxPayload.MovieFragmentHeaderBox to integrate sequence number parsing into the system.

functional_units.name: moof/mfhd Sequence Number Parser
functional_units.description: Parses fragment header information from moof/mfhd boxes and registers handlers to flow sequence numbers through the parse pipeline, JSON export, and CLI formatting.

functional_units.name: Sequence Number Validation
functional_units.description: Validates that fragment sequence numbers exist and remain monotonic across fragments.

functional_units.name: JSON Export of Sequence Metadata
functional_units.description: Exports parsed sequence number metadata in JSON format as part of the system output.

functional_units.name: CLI Formatting of Sequence Data
functional_units.description: Formats and displays sequence number information via command-line interface.
